long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Event Countdown Timer

Stay on top of your schedule with Event Countdown Timer, a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that helps you track and manage important dates in your life.

What It Does
Track all your important events in one place:
- Upcoming deadlines
- Special occasions
- Project milestones
- Travel dates
- Assignments and due dates
- Meetings and appointments

Key Features

üîç Smart Search
- Instantly find any event with the search bar
- Search by event name or notes
- Real-time filtering as you type
- Quick access to event details

üìÖ Real-Time Countdowns
- See exactly how much time is left until each event
- Dynamic updates showing days, hours, minutes, or seconds
- Past events automatically move to a separate section with "time ago" tracking

‚úèÔ∏è Enhanced Event Management
- Add events with just a name and date
- Add detailed notes to any event
- Edit events anytime with a simple click
- Quick delete option for outdated events
- Organize events automatically by date

üëÄ At-a-Glance View
- Clean, intuitive interface
- Powerful search functionality
- Separate sections for upcoming and past events
- Clear visual indicators for time remaining
- Access all your events with one click from your Chrome toolbar

Why You'll Love It
- Stay Organized: Never miss an important deadline or event
- Save Time: Quick access and search for all your important dates
- Reduce Stress: Visual countdown helps you plan and prepare
- Simple to Use: No complicated setup or configuration needed
- Always Available: Access your events directly from your browser

Perfect For
- Students tracking assignment deadlines
- Professionals managing project timelines
- Event planners coordinating multiple dates
- Anyone who wants to stay on top of important dates and deadlines

Technical Details
- Lightweight and fast
- Works offline
- Secure local storage
- No account required
- Free to use
- Instant search capability
